data.text: @EE Same number. I was an EE PAYG customer 2008-2011, then ported my number to O2, and ported it back a few weeks ago.
@EE hi, I bought the data add on for ¬£8.35 per month?? Why am I now being charged ¬£20 on my bill???? https://t.co/v2W41uxl8r
@EE Ok thanks.
Hi @EE . Can I someone to call me please as one of my devices is in Ireland not working.  Thanks.
@EE Amazed that after at least 2 weeks your app / website still won‚Äôt allow log-on https://t.co/Q062PXPJbV
@EE Thank you very much! Have a good weekend!
@EE It's all the spam HMRC calls. All from 07531 prefix numbers,  so I answer it thinking it's someone's mobile.
Is the @EE network down in East Hampshire?
@EE My prepaid SIM is having an auth error when trying to connect to the EE WiFi-Auto SSID in the underground. Have to activate in the store before use?
@Insy812 @EE @Etsy Must ask others how they find service locally
@EE That‚Äôs a laugh, cause most customers are still waiting for there s22 üòÇüòÇ me included üò¨
@EE Yeah I know it‚Äôs just annoying having these texts and even more seeing people and hearing that there‚Äôs have now been delivered

#LongLiveYourTech 
@EE 's Great Grandfather https://t.co/IzbMDp3WPP https://t.co/nEI0wAB351

@EE Yeah all good now thank you, went into the Southend branch to ask the question. Apparently my antenna broke, but luckily was due an upgrade anyway so they gave me a new phone which is only ¬£3 more per month from a iPhone 11 to 13. Thank you, appreciate it!!
@EE dreadful service. Made be pay ¬£10 and still can't send WhatsApp or messenger
@EE ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
@EE No thank you. Don't trust the process no more. Already gone through the complaints section and now I have to go to The Ombudsmen Service.
Fuck @EE by being allowed to put your contract up ¬£11 a month not long after you sign it. Absolute piss take, don‚Äôt care if you landed a plane from some whoppers living room on your Wi-Fi üò°

Well I won't be bothering with getting anything else from @EE.

Walk out of a shop with a new phone and figured I'd give a watch a go... wish I hadn't bothered... more hassle than it's worth... who wants to pay to put this much work in for it. Shit process. Shit service. Cba man.
@EE Won‚Äôt be the last one either
@EE I can see the update it's still not here or dispatched I doubt you can tell me any different than yesterday.

@EE Good afternoon, I hope you're well? I was just wondering if it is possible to do a trade-in deal and use my student discount on the same package as well? I am looking at the new S22+ and have a S20 to trade in but wanted to check before placing an order
@DrHoenderkamp @BorisJohnson @RishiSunak @EE have increased my phone bill by nearly 10% as well. Seriously considering emigrating
My @EE broadband is so useless I have to use 4g to do my @Etsy listings

Total nightmare with EE. Tried to upgrade and have had nothing but one f**k up after another and when I have contacted them to sort it I got absolutely no help what so ever. Think it might be time to go with another network which is a shame after being with EE for years @EE
@EE Hi. My SIM only is now out of contract and I wish to close the account. How do I do this? Thanks
Definitely not upgrading with @EE with their prices üëÄüëÄ

@EE Thanks Rachel, will sort it out after work once we get the text.
Appreciate you getting back to be. Lynn
@EE Hello, just spoke to two excellent humans. Worth navigating the hideous automated answer service to get to them, please make it easier üôè
@EE Why the hell my wifi so slow? Literally trying to download a Unity package, and it's downloading at 1,5 KB/s -.- I am literally using the 5GhZ -.-
@EE Ok will do thanks.
@EE Another day another no S22 ultra at my door.

@EE Hi just a quick question I have an old iPhone 10 that I got through you and have since got the iPhone 12. If I wanted to unblock the old iPhone to be able to use on other networks is that something you can do?

@EE you have texted me 4 times now! Telling me to pair my Samsung watch, problem there is, I haven‚Äôt received my s22 yet as I‚Äôm still waiting! So any chance you could just get it delivered or just stop rubbing it in that I can‚Äôt use my watch yet üò§
@EE I switched my phone back to EE 3 weeks ago. Now I'm getting nonstop spam calls from other EE numbers. Can you do anything about this?

@EE how wonderful EE is, taken money from my account, no phone arrived, called just sent around in circles, not being able to talk to anyone. There is another account due for renewal the way you have treated us, lied to us, there is fat chance of that rather use more code.

@EE hello! What is the current wait time for the S22. I ordered Wednesday 16th and I have until 31st March to send off my old phone for trade in. Is it going to be cutting it fine to meet that deadline?

@EE @EEHelpdesk I do not understand why one of your managers won't tell me the address they've sent a parcel to. I'm absolutely fuming about this and all my concerns are feeling ignored. It's all feeling so incredibly unprofessional and suspicious https://t.co/fozaSNwV0k
@EE Done
@pipebrush @EE I haven't heard nothing off them at all. Did you get a message or anything before hand?

@ee I am mad as hell at you. I have been a customer since when you where Orange. You let me down. I spent ¬£624 on a watch and between you and DPD you can‚Äôt even get it delivered. Think I‚Äôll give O2 a call.
@EE We do have a line, nobody can find where it ends up after it disappears into the wall by my front door
@EE @ItsLewisMorg Lots getting delivered today including mine üòä
@EE Tried to order this as an upgrade this morning but your atrocious website failed. Also taking the piss by charging me (a 5yr+ customer) more for my loyalty. Shambles
@EE I‚Äôve been getting this for months. I even called to report the issue. Still happening. https://t.co/oaIxFd6vxd
@L_J_Gren @EE Yep lots of people getting them delivered today including myself üòÄ
@EE Done!
@BounceNewsNg @ItsEliOyefeso @CryptobuddyInfo @EE
@EE Hi Peter. It's an additional line

@EE, afternoon! I ordered a sim only deal on Monday via phone. Was told it would be in post next day but alas, it hasn't arrived. Any help and information would be appreciated
@EE You too ! :)

Hi @EE I got a call from this number claiming to be you - 01462 341325 saying they had information on offers available to me. Is it legitimate? Thanks.

@EE The postcode is the postcode for Greenwich Park, it‚Äôs an enormous Royal park covering 183 acres which I am unlikely to be living in unless my personal circumstances take a massive downhill dive.

@EE Yes I do

Great project @KKRiders @EE @asvpxrocky https://t.co/yWzfeXZjuo
@EE I‚Äôve had one before but no for years - no longer connected
I‚Äôm Gona kill @EE charging me extra roaming fee for no reason

@MarcAllera @EE @crazymike1988 :-) famous Mike
@EE iPhone 12 Pro Max
@EE Have done

@EE I'm unable to top up my phone. Is there ongoing issue?
@EE I have the @btsport smart benefit - how come I can't always use it on my laptop as advertised? #notworking
@EE Your app isn't working correctly as it won't show what extra charges I'm being billed for. Screen is blank. ¬£3 a min to call the States is ridiculous by the way! https://t.co/1RaEEtgECP

Local ‚Äúfree‚Äù WiFi *much* slower than @EE on #4G. Looking forward to #5G coming to #Harrogate town centre!
@Speedtest https://t.co/VxDZAt79J6

@EE In a few short sentences. I am not getting a decent signal. It drops from 5G through 4G to 3G then E and loses connection when I‚Äôm on the phone. There is no mobile data when I‚Äôm on the phone. I‚Äôm currently piggybacking Wi-Fi ATM
@EE recently got a new phone on insurance as accidentally damaged step daughters and we‚Äôve been sent a iPhone 11 not 12? Can someone assist please asap ? Thanks
@EE can I have an update on my order please?
@EE It‚Äôs Greenwich Park, not sure if there‚Äôs a postcode for the whole park as not a lot of people live in it. However postcode for car park at Blackheath end is SE10 8QY
@EE Hi jo, when I press set up for myself it‚Äôs saying this plan isn‚Äôt supported when I put it my Apple ID?!
don't know why I bother anymore with @EE , getting internet on my iPhone lately has been awful....contract is almost up so I guess its time for a new phone and supplier
Great timing from @EE on my timeline! https://t.co/hSOEz7ECqM
@EE I‚Äôve just got a new Apple Watch but it‚Äôs come with a different number - and can‚Äôt connect to current phone any idea why?! Thank you :)
@EE Hi Chris its not just me its everyone since you put the price up by nearly 10%. Just imagine the kudos if EE said we have decided to cancel the increase this year as everyone has higher bills..

We‚Äôve also partnered with Samsung to help customers with hearing impairments get the most out of @EE and the new Samsung S22 range, too.

When our in-store QR code is scanned it links to videos about the new Samsung series with sign language interpreter Simon and closed captions. https://t.co/VOC0WxHLeJ
@EE I‚Äôm doing good :) have an amazing day

Communication's so important. Small things have a big impact.

It might be the end of #SignLanguageWeek, but we're partnering with @SamsungUK to encourage our @EE store teams to learn some BSL basics with a series of videos like this ‚Äì so customers with hearing loss feel at ease. https://t.co/SzrVK5uzlO
@EE Good morning ! How are you today ee?
@EE I already done the deal, they should of done that without me having to ask really.
@EE Returns team number is ‚Äúvery busy‚Äù.
@EE Really disappointed to see how much more EE was charging me after being with them for so long- (before they were EE) compared to other companies as a new customer.
@EE Hi, just received my iPhone 13 pro max with seal on the box broken. There was no protective bubble wrap at all. Called 150 and got fobbed off. What is supposed to happen? Not happy
@EE I have D'Med you per your request!!

@EE Thanks for responding,appreciated,Im ok,I have a poorly pup so not much sleep but getting there,hows urself?I ended up looking about & found a deal with 3,unlimited Everything on Samsung Z3 Flip,24mnth with insurance but less than EE,so ive moved.(20+yr with EE)Have a lovely day.

Each of our Year 5 pupils planted a tree in the school grounds yesterday!  Thank you to @WoodlandTrust for supplying the trees and volunteers from our local @EE office in Merthyr for supporting the children! https://t.co/jKXRrLtqOm

tweets.text: @annaonthemoon Did you keep hold of your existing number when you moved back to us or did you start fresh with a new number? -Bob

@annaonthemoon Ahh okay, so it sounds like someone spoofing a number by the sounds of things there. If you do get calls like that, it's a good idea to text CALL to 7726 they will text you back asking for the number that the call came from which helps to tackle these scam calls. -Bob

@HorseRacing779 Ah great stuff and the new iPhone 13's are lovely aren't they. That's not bad either just ¬£3 a month more :). Enjoy the weekend If we can help with anything else at all just give us a shout :) -Mark

@annaonthemoon Hey Rebecca, I hope you're well. 

I know getting a load of unwanted calls can be a real pain. Have you answered any of the calls to see if there is anyone on the other end? -Bob

And we‚Äôve partnered with Samsung to help customers with hearing impairments get the most out of EE and the new Samsung S22 range, too.

When our in-store QR code is scanned, it links to videos about the new Samsung series with sign language interpreter Simon, and closed captions. https://t.co/xggCSlaJJV

@Michael57690152 Hi Michael, 

I'm sorry to hear that you're still waiting to receive your new phone. I know that you'll want to get this as soon as possible to start using it and the watch. As soon as the phone is available, it will be dispatched and on it's way to you. -Russ

It's cash for trash month! But wait, it's not trash to us. We'll give you ¬£5 when you recycle any old tech in stores.üí∞

@Punkdude1981 Ah right, I am pleased you have that to check. Sorry, you are right, I will not have any further information than that. We will get it to you as quickly as we can. - Sarahjane

We're on a mission to treat our customers how they would want to be treated.

Usually, first thing we might do is grab pen and paper. That's okay. But there's more we can do to make people with hearing impairments more feel safer, more comfortable, and their experience better.

@KintmLu Aww I hope your puppy is better soon. I'm good thank you :) Oh no, that is such a shame. Could the upgrades team not look at matching the deal for you? -Kelsey

I'm really sorry that you've been left feeling so disappointed by the service when you've been upgrading, I can absolutely appreciate that any unexpected charges are always an unwelcome surprise! I'd like to have a look into this, could you DM me? - Jess https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

I can have a little look at it. Can you pop me a DM with a screen shot of what you're seeing, please? -Kelsey https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0
